{{disambig-more|Third Age|[[Third Age (disambiguation)]]}}
[[Image:Third Age (Modding Comunity).png|''The 3rd Age'' website background.|thumb]]

'''The 3rd Age''', also known as the '''T3A Community''', is a large modding community on the internet which hosts mods for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology|The Battle for Middle-Earth Anthology]]'' and has over one hundred tutorials about making modifications, modeling, coding, skinning, scripting and mapping.
